title: The capacity of the SWH system to be installed on the building shall be decided on the basis of the average occupancy of the buildings
clause_text: The capacity of the SWH system to be installed on the building shall be decided on the basis of the average occupancy of the buildings. The norms for hospitals, hotels and other buildings are given below:
section: Special Provisions; for installation of Solar Water Heating (SWH) Systems.
